thread.title: Best of the rest: More fun things to do Oct. 22-28
thread.title_full: Best of the rest: More fun things to do Oct. 22-28

author: freep.com
title: Best of the rest: More fun things to do Oct. 22-28
text:
MORE GROSSE POINTE SHORES
Festival of Tables
Inspire your imagination and get table decorating ideas as 28 themed tables are displayed at the Daughters of Penelope’s 13 th annual Festival of Tables. This fund-raiser benefits St. John Providence Health System Breast Care Program.
The event includes vendors, music, a fashion show with models who are members of the Detroit Young Survival Coalition and a silent and tin can auction. The Anthony L. Soave Family Mobile Mammography & Health Screening Center from St. John Providence Health System will be on site.
There will be two viewings. The first viewing is 1-4 p.m. The second is 4:30-8:30 p.m. and includes dinner and a fashion show.
Saturday, Grosse Pointe Yacht Club, 788 Lake Shore, Grosse Pointe Shores. dopfestivaloftables.com The first viewing is $15 in advance, $20 at the door. The second is $70.
CLAWSON
Meet Michigan Authors
Meet and mingle with Michigan Authors at the sixth annual Leon & Lulu Books & Authors event.
Fifty authors are expected at this juried book fair. They will sign and sell their books and read excerpts. Refreshments will be served.
A portion of the proceeds will benefit the Oakland Literacy Council.
11 a.m.-5 p.m. Sunday, Leon & Lulu, 96 W. Fourteen Mile, Clawson. 248-288-3600. leonandlulu.com . Free.
— Brendel Hightower, Detroit Free Press
